name: Icosphere
description:
Controls:
W, A, S, D - Movement
Q, E - Rotate camera
Shift - Dash ability (cooldown)
Crtl or R - Groundpound ability (cooldown)
Unlockables
Left Click - Laser ability (cooldown)
Right Click - Bomb ability (cooldown)

How to Play:
Squash, zap and explode invading slimes; earn points to upgrade in the shop and defend your planet!

Features:
Physics-based movement
Easy, hard & sandbox mode
Upgrade shop system
Enemy wave defense system
and lots more!

Description:
You are a spore tasked with defending the sacred homeland of the Ictosphere's from the invading slime army. These criters will shoot you out of the sky unless you have your wits about you. Use points to upgrade your abilities and unlock powerful skills, seeing how long you can last!
